title: League Incompatible?
body: I've been playing league for a few years now and have never had an issue till  very recently. I've had Windows 10 for a long time and it has not given me issues till now. I will load up league then log in screen will appear and everything seems normal. So I will log in then all of a sudden everything is Extremely slow, my whole computer screen will start to spaz if that makes any sense, and it does not let me click anything because it is extremely slow. Once I get out of league this spazzing of sorts will stop. I went into troubleshoot compatibility and it said it was not compatible. I've tried running as Admin as well but nothing seems to be working.

replies.body:
Hey Angelic Notes!

If you right click the League application it will have an option of "Test Compatibility" run that diagnostic. It should save league under some windows 7 settings and run normal, make sure to save settings on exiting.

I had many of the same problems, this fixed mine
Wow that helped! Thanks so much! I'm glad to get back on LoL!

There may be some system driver or hardware issues going on. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) as a next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if your symptoms persist through those changes.
I just looked at it. I noticed it mentioned a lot of stuff about the Xbox app and Game bar app  both I do not have   :l

> [{quoted}](name=AngelicNotes,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wIdeHUpT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-16T18:53:09.272+0000)
>
> I just looked at it. I noticed it mentioned a lot of stuff about the Xbox app and Game bar app  both I do not have   :l

Unless you have removed it previously or are not on Windows 10, I can assure you that you do. Please follow the instructions exactly.
